# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Burner mining drills, burner inserters, and boilers require fuel to operate.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them.
- Stone furnaces require ingredients to smelt.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid.
- Steam engines require a connection to the power grid to generate power.

### Errors when using entities without being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into the electric network.
- Electricity groups require being plugged into the electric network to function.

### Errors when using transport belts without items
- Ensure that transport belts have items to transport.
- Belt groups and transport belts require items to transport.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or assigned in the given execution logs.
